title: Champion Men's T-Shirt, Classic Graphic T-Shirt, Soft and Comfortable T-Shirts for Men, Script Logo (Reg. or Big & Tall)
description: THE FIT - Standard-fit men's T-shirt for easy, all-day comfort.
THE FEEL - Made with a comfortable, 5.5 oz. cotton or cotton blend.
THE LOOK - Crewneck shirt style with matching back neck tape for a classic look.
THE GRAPHIC - Signature script logo at the center chest for authentic style.
SPOT THE C - Iconic C logo patch at the left sleeve.
Note: C logo patch color may vary from image.
